name: No Love (itch)
description:
You've tried to get into a relationship many, many times; each time is an additional failure to add to your list. You're now over it and want to move on. It can't hurt to keep trying, right?

No Love is a game written in Python about relationships for the Wowie! Jam 3.0, where to give up on relationships is to win, and to succeed in getting one is a failure. Can you drain yourself and give yourself pale shelter, or will you fail?

Operating System Requirements

  • Mac: macOS 10.15 Catalina or greater
  • Windows: WIndows 7 or greater
  • Linux: (Recommended) Ubuntu 20.04 or greater*

*There is no set requirement for Linux distributions, but this game was built under Ubuntu 20.04 LTS for x86-64 architecture. Your mileage may vary!

Important Info about Windows

The Windows version is not code signed because I don't have the certificates or the ability to really do so. Your antivirus may flag the game as a virus; you can disregard this if you downloaded it from itch.io and the source code matches what's on GitHub.

Open Source Information

This game is open source software, licensed under the Mozilla Public License v2.0. You can view the game's code on GitHub and use parts of the code as you wish per the  license. You can learn more about what you can do at https://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
